page.title: 20Education,N.Wingfield
page.content: {Educational facilities} Years 0-3.....Mother and toddler group 3-5.....Nursery class & pre-school playgroup 5-11....Primary school 5-7.....Infant school 7-11....Junior school 11-16...Comprehensive school 16-18...No facility in the area Adult education-a varied programme {************************************** We would like to thank all the children and parents of children in North Wingfield Junior School, whose replies to our questions enabled us to do this work.We are also grateful for the contributions of: Mrs.J.D.Fisher ;Clay Cross Ranger Service;Mr.C.S.Durbin;Mr.M.D.Edge; Mrs.P.Wildbore. {Mrs.J.E.Durbin;Mrs.F.M.Brown.
